programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.desc: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. IMDb data; ttnr: 2819924, Title: Candice Renoir, --- Description: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. programme.desc: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Special Agent Leon S.Kennedy goes against his superior's orders and works to destroy a series of biological weapons being used in a war zone in Europe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1753496/","name":"Baiohazado: Damuneshon","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDY2M2RkMmMtNGY3Yy00MTg0LWJmMmItNjEzODJjYTViZjA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Special Agent Leon S.Kennedy goes against his superior's orders and works to destroy a series of biological weapons being used in a war zone in Europe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1753496/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"nhatlamsokul"},"dateCreated":"2012-09-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Best resident evil movie yet!!!","reviewBody":"I can't say anything more! it's amazing to me that Capcom and Sony have brought the best movie of the series to all of us, and importantly the fans of the video game. Resident Evil Damnation was a spectacular breakthrough, more interesting and better than RE: Degeneration. The Effect and CG was great to me, it showed the monsters extremely vividly, beautiful slow-motions. You must keep your eyes open all almost 2hrs because of the very-fast rhythm and nice action of Leon and Ada. The noteworthy thing is about the Lickers- fast,many and even they were the good assistants (know while watching!!!???). Dramatic has been pushed up to the climax when Leon and Buddy against 2 giant Tyrans. And that was the 2nd anniversary of Leon when he was getting on the brink of death to save someone (1st in RE Degeneration)!!! Will you have a good day off? So let's buy the DVD or Bluray from 25 Sep. and enjoy it, maybe you'll agree with my reviews. My rating: 9/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20035,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Animation","Action","Horror"],"datePublished":"2012-10-27","keywords":"resident evil,based on game,anime,second part,sequel","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Resident Evil: Damnation","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1497283097","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWIzMGMwNmYtYmJkYy00N2ZjLWIxZjYtNDQyNTc3MDcxMjA5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWIzMGMwNmYtYmJkYy00N2ZjLWIxZjYtNDQyNTc3MDcxMjA5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Resident Evil: Damnation"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2233310/","name":"Matthew Mercer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1043186/","name":"Dave Wittenberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0283253/","name":"Wendee Lee"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0436780/","name":"Makoto Kamiya"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0065386/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0052145/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0654565/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1591046/","name":"Shotaro Suga"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0586353/","name":"Shinji Mikami"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1306714/","name":"Noboru Sugimura"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ariana Grande Live in London
programme.desc: Nagranie koncertu Ariany Grande z 2018 roku. Gwiazda muzyki pop wykonuje największe przeboje z całej swojej kariery, jak i z wydanego w tamtym czasie albumu "Sweetener". Akompaniuje jej kobieca orkiestra.

programme.title: The Pianist
Pianista
The Pianist
programme.desc:
The Pianist: Directed by Roman Polanski. With Adrien Brody, Emilia Fox, Michal Zebrowski, Ed Stoppard. A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0253474/","name":"The Pianist","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWRiZDIxZjktMTA1NC00MDQ2LWEzMjUtMTliZmY3NjQ3ODJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0OTQ0OTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0253474/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Quinoa1984"},"dateCreated":"2003-01-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Stoic, haunting tale of survival","reviewBody":"The Pianist tells the story of such a man in war time Poland, played by Adrien Brody, who from start to finish sees his life literally getting worse and worse and worse- starts off with new rules from the Nazis, then the stars on the arms, followed by the Warsaw ghetto, and while there he could play in the restaurant, that too soon ended, as the trains arrived and took his family and anyone else he knew away. During this he narrowly escapes, and from then on the film in a sense almost becomes not exactly a holocaust film, but more like a cross of that as the element and the basic structure of something a-la in Cast Away: this includes stretches of scenes showing Brody simply trying to keep out of view of the Germans, either in a small apartment provided by helpful Polish Christians/Jewish resistance, or as a scavenger in the abandoned sections of the ghetto, all while feeling the old rhythm of the piano in his head and fingertips. 

This is the kind of magnificent filmmaking that shows a director not only being as true to the story given to him (that of Painist Szpilman, based on his autobiography) but to his past as well- Roman Polanksi faced similar conditions as a boy in the early 40's, and has found the best line to show, never crossed or mis-stepped, in representing the characters and the period. There aren't any hints of tightened suspense, no clues as to where the film could veer to, it just is. The big difference to be seen between a film like this and Schindler's List is not just in the people and situations (Schindler's List was a film about two people, Schindler and Goeth, in the foreground while the Pianist is a total first person tale), yet also in the filmmaking qualities being here surely European. And while the accents on the Polish-Jewish actors sounds a bit too British, that is quite forgivable considering the scope of the project (thank heavens he didn't put in English speaking Germans).

In conclusion, Brody turns in a superb performance, and this indeed is in with Polanski's best, a deserved of 2002's Palme D'Or. Great music too. A+","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":782840,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.5},"contentRating":"(Banned)","genre":["Biography","Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2002-09-25","keywords":"pianist,holocaust,survival,nazi occupied poland,person in a wheelchair falls from height","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Pianist","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi988938521","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmQ4MWQzNDEtYmI4Zi00NmY0LWEwYTEtZTg4MmQ3MDM2YmJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmQ4MWQzNDEtYmI4Zi00NmY0LWEwYTEtZTg4MmQ3MDM2YmJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Focus Features"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004778/","name":"Adrien Brody"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0470981/","name":"Thomas Kretschmann"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0277975/","name":"Frank Finlay"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000591/","name":"Roman Polanski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0024473/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030304/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0053177/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0367838/","name":"Ronald Harwood"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0844262/","name":"Wladyslaw Szpilman"}],"duration":"PT2H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: As Gouda as it Gets
Gouda i miłość
As Gouda as It Gets
programme.desc: As Gouda as it Gets: Directed by Anne De Léan. With Kim Shaw, Clayton James, Tara Joshi, Romaine Waite. Artisan cheese shop owner Brie finds herself competing for a $50,000 prize in her town's annual Cheese Festival. To boost her presence, she teams up with an influential cheese critic to profile her vintage smoked gouda. As their friendship develops into romance, a competitor's business proposal and unforeseen complications force Brie to put her shop - and heart - on the line." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt13176206/","name":"As Gouda as it Gets","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDQ2YjVkOGMtNzE3NC00MmU0LTk3ZWEtOGE5OGU4NjljOGM4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTk1NzUwMA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Artisan cheese shop owner Brie finds herself competing for a $50,000 prize in her town's annual Cheese Festival. programme.title: Hollywood Buzz
programme.desc: W programie nowości kinowe, relacje z planów zdjęciowych oraz ciekawostki związanych z gwiazdami srebrnego ekranu. O pracy nad najnowszymi hollywoodzkimi produkcjami opowiadają ich twórcy - znani reżyserzy i aktorzy. Autorzy magazynu przedstawiają również zwiastuny filmów wchodzących na ekrany kin.

programme.title: Baggage Claim
Bez bagażu
Baggage Claim
programme.desc: Baggage Claim: Directed by David E. Talbert. With Paula Patton, Derek Luke, Taye Diggs, Boris Kodjoe. Pledging to keep herself from being the oldest and the only woman in her entire family never to wed, Montana embarks on a thirty-day, thirty-thousand-mile expedition to charm a potential suitor into becoming her fiancé." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1171222/","name":"Baggage Claim","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIyNDU4NTY3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTA3MDA1OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Pledging to keep herself from being the oldest and the only woman in her entire family never to wed, Montana embarks on a thirty-day, thirty-thousand-mile expedition to charm a potential suitor into becoming her fiancé.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1171222/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blanbrn"},"dateCreated":"2013-10-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Watch it for the eye candy that's Paula Patton.","reviewBody":""Baggage Claim" is one of those typical romantic comedies that's predictable you have the girl meets a guy in an unexpected way and falls in love. And true it has plenty of one liners and funny lines to entertain a viewer and it's filled with sugar and spice love scenes to enjoy. As it was a nice eye candy treat seeing the sexy Paula Patton in scenes of sexy lingerie like colored bras. Anyway the story is typical Paula is Montana a flight attendant who's still single and she feels tough when her younger sister is getting married so she starts a plan it's 30 days to find a husband or bust! And this involves trips on airline flights as she sets up meeting after meeting with her past boyfriends to try and reconnect for love in the air! As Montana is tired of being the oldest that's not married! It takes a surprise love twist at the end anyway it's to predictable still watch it for the sexy eye candy scenes of Paula Patton.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":9146,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2013-09-27","keywords":"gay character,woman wears only a man's shirt,marriage proposal,karaoke bar,karaoke","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1964549657","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ5NTEzOTg2Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzY4MzA1OQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ5NTEzOTg2Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzY4MzA1OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Pledging to keep herself from being the oldest and the only woman in her entire family never to wed, Montana embarks on a thirty-day, thirty-thousand-mile expedition to charm a potential suitor into becoming her fiancÃ©."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1745736/","name":"Paula Patton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004875/","name":"Taye Diggs"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0779325/","name":"Jill Scott"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0847859/","name":"David E. programme.title: Les Misérables
Les Misérables: Nędznicy
Les Misérables
programme.desc:
Les Misérables: Directed by Tom Hooper. With Hugh Jackman, Russell Crowe, Anne Hathaway, Amanda Seyfried. In 19th-century France, Jean Valjean, who for decades has been hunted by the ruthless policeman Javert after breaking parole, agrees to care for a factory worker's daughter. The decision changes their lives forever." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1707386/","name":"Les Misérables","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ4NDI3NDg4M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjY5OTI1OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 19th-century France, Jean Valjean, who for decades has been hunted by the ruthless policeman Javert after breaking parole, agrees to care for a factory worker's daughter. The decision changes their lives forever.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1707386/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"antesdespues"},"dateCreated":"2012-12-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Breathtaking - A Musical with Heart","reviewBody":"I went to an awards screening of Les Miserables and left the cinema speechless. Tom Hooper's direction and the cinematography, costumes, art design and editing are nothing short of genius.

Hooper's idea to have the actors sing live really brings a deeper emotion to the film not seen in other movie musicals. Hugh Jackman is absolutely incredible as Jean Valjean and carries the film with spectacular grace. Anne Hathaway is magnificent in her fleeting role as Fantine - the film's sequence in which she goes on a downward spiral is one of the it's best moments, and her ABSOLUTELY INCREDIBLE HEARTFELT rendition of 'I Dreamed A Dream' will win her the Oscar by itself.

Also, a great supporting turn from newcomer Samantha Barks as the heartbroken Eponine (look out for her waist - it's absolutely tiny!), who is sure to be shot into stardom. Eddie Redmayne, Russell Crowe and Aaron Tveit are also good, and there's some great comedy relief from Helena Bonham Carter and Sacha Baron Cohen.

It will leave you laughing, crying, and feeling inspired. A great watch, sure to win some major awards this year! 10/10!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":320549,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Musical","Romance"],"datePublished":"2013-01-02","keywords":"rebellion,france,orphan,parole,barricade","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Winner: Best Supporting Actress","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2712512281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM5ODYxODY1NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjk3OTc3OA@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM5ODYxODY1NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjk3OTc3OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch a TV trailer for Les Miserables."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0413168/","name":"Hugh Jackman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000128/","name":"Russell Crowe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004266/","name":"Anne Hathaway"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0393799/","name":"Tom Hooper"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0057311/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103961/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0629933/","name":"William Nicholson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0098842/","name":"Alain Boublil"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0774744/","name":"Claude-Michel Schönberg"}],"duration":"PT2H38M"}</script><metacontent="

An Arctic fox works in the mailroom of a package delivery service, but wants to be doing the deliveries." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4426464/","name":"Arctic Justice","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTY1OTQyM2YtM2ZjOC00OWQwLTkzM2YtZjAyOGZkYjlhNWFhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTk5MzE1MTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"An Arctic fox works in the mailroom of a package delivery service, but wants to be doing the deliveries.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4426464/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"xomlaodong"},"dateCreated":"2019-11-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Boring and bland...skip this one.","reviewBody":"Overall not the best animation fornthis year. Angry Birds 2 and Abominable were much better.\n\nThis movie was boring while lacking humor. Pretty dry and bland. There's nothing to take home from as the main theme/message but just senseless boredom. I don't recommend it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1790,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.8},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2019-11-01","keywords":"cgi animation,mail delivery,mail,cartoon dog,cartoon mouse","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi731889433","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc2YmY3MmMtYWMzMS00YmZmLThhYWQtNDJkYmNhMTdmYjAxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc2YmY3MmMtYWMzMS00YmZmLThhYWQtNDJkYmNhMTdmYjAxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Swifty the Arctic Fox (Jeremy Renner) works in the mailroom of the Arctic Blast Delivery Service but dreams of one day becoming a Top Dog (the Arctic's star husky courier). To prove himself worthy of the Top Dog role, Swifty secretly commandeers one of the sleds and delivers a mysterious package to a secret location. He stumbles upon a hidden fortress, where he comes face to face with Otto Von Walrus (John Cleese), a blubbery evil genius, who walks around on mechanical legs and commands a loyal army of oddly polite puffin henchmen. Swifty soon discovers Otto Von Walrus' plan to drill beneath Arctic surface to unleash enough ancient gas to melt the Arctic, in order to reign as the world's supreme leader. Now, Swifty has to enlist the help of his friends: PB (Alec Baldwin), an introverted polar bear, Lemmy (James Franco), a scatterbrained albatross, Jade Fox (Heidi Klum), a tough as nails mechanic, Leopold (Omar Sy) and Bertha (Heidi Klum), two conspiracy theorist otters and Magda (Anjelica Huston), the curmudgeonly boss. This ragtag group of Arctic misfits has to band together to stop Otto Von Walrus' sinister plans and save the day."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0719637/","name":"Jeremy Renner"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005099/","name":"Heidi Klum"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0290556/","name":"James Franco"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005616/","name":"Aaron Woodley"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0478960/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0587902/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0561881/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1779809/","name":"Bob Barlen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2117510/","name":"Cal Brunker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2474213/","name":"Matthew Lyon"}],"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="

A couple's wedding plans are thrown off course when the groom is diagnosed with liver cancer." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8305852/","name":"All My Life","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGJiMzBlY2ItZTRjNS00OWFiLWI4YmUtZjVlMmY4OWFhMTIxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A couple's wedding plans are thrown off course when the groom is diagnosed with liver cancer.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8305852/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Sophia-Jones"},"dateCreated":"2021-10-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pleasantly sweet.","reviewBody":"I'm a sucker for a movie based on true events most of the time. This movie didn't disappoint. It makes you think about you and what you are doing with your life right now. Are you happy? Are you living your best life or trying to live in the past? I appreciate this movie and the live that it shared.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3297,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2020-12-04","keywords":"wedding,three word title,terminal illness,cancer,liver cancer","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3348087065","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTY5MmI2ODItMGNhZS00MjQzLTgwYTEtMGViNjZkMDA4NzA0XkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTY5MmI2ODItMGNhZS00MjQzLTgwYTEtMGViNjZkMDA4NzA0XkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"Based on the powerful true love story that inspired an entire nation, All My Life follows the journey of an engaged couple who make the difficult decision to accelerate their wedding in the wake of a devastating discovery."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1557329/","name":"Jessica Rothe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1484270/","name":"Harry Shum Jr."},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2900746/","name":"Marielle Scott"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1836315/","name":"Marc Meyers"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0163543/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0739708/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1565798/","name":"Todd Rosenberg"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Scoob
Listy do M. 4
programme.desc:
Scoob!: Directed by Tony Cervone. With Will Forte, Mark Wahlberg, Jason Isaacs, Gina Rodriguez. Scooby and the gang face their most challenging mystery ever: a plot to unleash the ghost dog Cerberus upon the world. As they race to stop this dogpocalypse, the gang discovers that Scooby has an epic destiny greater than anyone imagined." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3152592/","name":"Scoob!","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTJmODM0MDQtMTRjYy00YWZjLThjODItMzQ5N2I2NDBjYzA1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDA4NzMyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Scooby and the gang face their most challenging mystery ever: a plot to unleash the ghost dog Cerberus upon the world. As they race to stop this dogpocalypse, the gang discovers that Scooby has an epic destiny greater than anyone ima","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3152592/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"alv790"},"dateCreated":"2020-06-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"if you want a Scooby movie, this is not it","reviewBody":"It started well, with a touching scene of the main characters meeting for the forst time as kids (or puppies, in Scooby's case) and then having one of their traditional adventures. However, this only lasts 15 minutes, and from there the movie stops being a Scooby Doo movie and starts being a superhero movie, with Dick Dastardly as the supervillain, and Blue Falcon and his gang as superheroes, with the Scooby gang stuck there in a movie that is not their own.

Because let's face it, just like in a James Bond movie we have certain expectations, in a Scoob movie we also have expectations, and they are not met. That distinctive type of adventures where they explore a haunted location and, after many scares, end up discovering that it was all a not supernatural trick by some criminal, is not here, except for a brief nod at the beginning. Instead, we get a generic modern children's movie, with characters running around from chase to chase, battle to battle and explosion to explosion without a compelling plot, while making pop culture references. The plot involves saving the world from a large-scale supernatural threat (really supernatural, none of the subversion characteristic of the source material).

So, if we forget about wanting a Scooby Doo movie and focus on the movie we get, it's not very good either. You can see where they try to have jokes for the adult watchers, but they lack the wit and talent to make them funny. They occasionally remember that this is supposed to be a Scooby Doo movie, and they have traditional gags like having Scooby and Shaggy, in the middle of being chased by the critters, turn around and serve the critters as waiters, disconcerting them for a while, but it's too little and done without much talent. You also get a scene where two male characters fight and a female character says it's toxic masculinity, which is kind of a hateful message to send to children.

In short, if you want a Scooby movie, this is not it, and if you want a generic modern kid's movie, this is not a good one."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":24305,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2020-05-15","keywords":"shared universe,scooby doo character,great dane,cartoon dog,dog","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Final Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2309144089","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTFmN2FkYTItODA3Ny00YzY5LWFmODEtNDlhZjE4YjgwY2VhXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTFmN2FkYTItODA3Ny00YzY5LWFmODEtNDlhZjE4YjgwY2VhXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","description":"Mystery loves company. Watch the new trailer for #SCOOB!"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0287182/","name":"Will Forte"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000242/","name":"Mark Wahlberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005042/","name":"Jason Isaacs"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0148999/","name":"Tony Cervone"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0468593/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0024579/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1186373/","name":"Adam Sztykiel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3242555/","name":"Jack C. programme.title: 25 lat niewinnosci. Sprawa Tomka Komendy
25 lat niewinności. Sprawa Tomka Komendy
programme.desc:
25 lat niewinnosci. Sprawa Tomka Komendy: Directed by Jan Holoubek. With Piotr Trojan, Agata Kulesza, Dariusz Chojnacki, Jan Frycz. The ordinary life of Tomasz Komenda is turned upside down when he is wrongly accused of brutal murder and sentenced to 25 years in prison." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11368998/","name":"25 lat niewinnosci. Sprawa Tomka Komendy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2E3YWNhMTgtMzRiZS00N2UxLWJkYzEtOGYyMWFhNDhlZmExXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEwMTY3NDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The ordinary life of Tomasz Komenda is turned upside down when he is wrongly accused of brutal murder and sentenced to 25 years in prison.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11368998/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"v-26640"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"A powerful movie about how person can be sentenced on circumstantial evidences.","reviewBody":"Tomasz Komenda was sentenced about 3 years after the crime had been committed basing on simple idea - 'find me a man and we fill forge evidences against him'. What this move does not show is that at that time Attorney General, now deceased Lech Kaczynski had been urged that a killer is found and sentenced to silence medias hysteria and coverage about brutal murder and rape of that young girl. Later when the murder was put on Tomasz, he was publicly defamed by Lech Kaczynski. Despite Mr L. Kaczynski death in Smolensk plane crash and after Tomasz was exonerated, no polish public institution nor police have never apologized Tomasz for their actions, which is a standard practice in western democratic countries.

Not much changed in post-soviet bloc however after 1990 in terms of judiciary mentality. Human Rights Watch estimates that 1-3% of sentences in Poland may be those in which innocent people are sentenced just because either suspects were threatened by police to force to confess by beatings. No effective police control and their procedures exists as of today. You may call it a mafia or not but I believe it's not far from truth in Poland.

Personally I believe his family did not do enough to get him out of prison, a good lawyer would smash the case easily and he is worth every money, why did it happen 15 years later is a mystery for me.

As Tomasz said after his release, there are no good people in prisons , there is only evil.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":906,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-09-18","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3825975/","name":"Piotr Trojan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0474492/","name":"Agata Kulesza"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2621963/","name":"Dariusz Chojnacki"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1450132/","name":"Jan Holoubek"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0015575/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0185099/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1733303/","name":"Andrzej Golda"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1450132/","name":"Jan Holoubek"}],"duration":"PT1H56M"}</script><metacontent="

Kaczynski death in Smolensk plane crash and after Tomasz was exonerated, no polish public institution nor police have never apologized Tomasz for their actions, which is a standard practice in western democratic countries.

Not much changed in post-soviet bloc however after 1990 in terms of judiciary mentality. Human Rights Watch estimates that 1-3% of sentences in Poland may be those in which innocent people are sentenced just because either suspects were threatened by police to force to confess by beatings. No effective police control and their procedures exists as of today. You may call it a mafia or not but I believe it's not far from truth in Poland.

Personally I believe his family did not do enough to get him out of prison, a good lawyer would smash the case easily and he is worth every money, why did it happen 15 years later is a mystery for me.

As Tomasz said after his release, there are no good people in prisons , there is only evil.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":906,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-09-18","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3825975/","name":"Piotr Trojan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0474492/","name":"Agata Kulesza","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2621963/","name":"Dariusz Chojnacki"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1450132/","name":"Jan Holoubek"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0015575/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0185099/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1733303/","name":"Andrzej Golda","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1450132/","name":"Jan Holoubek"],"duration":"PT1H56M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Miedzy oczy
Między oczy
programme.desc: Miedzy oczy: Directed by Piotr Weresniak. With Tamara Arciuch, Dominika Kluzniak, Bartek Kasprzykowski, Bartosz Opania. Two married couples, friends from college, meet after fifteen years to spend the weekend together in a summer house by the water. Unexpectedly for themselves, there is more that separates them than connects them. Old friends represent different world views, social, religious and civilizational attitudes of the contemporary world. The cultural war going on in the world today has reached them as well. When it finally seems that there are opportunities for a common language beyond divisions, something happens that exacerbates the conflict even more." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt16222346/","name":"Miedzy oczy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmNkMTZlMTUtYjFmNy00YzE5LTlhM2MtMDk0MWY5YTY3NzQyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEwMTY3NDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two married couples, friends from college, meet after fifteen years to spend the weekend together in a summer house by the water. programme.title: Niezapomniane filmy o Bożym Narodzeniu
programme.desc: Grono krytyków rozmawia o najlepszych w historii kina opowieściach wigilijnych. Są to wzruszające, zabawne oraz zaskakujące produkcje, których tłem jest, nie zawsze białe, Boże Narodzenie. Wśród nich znajduje się m.in. film "Fanny i Aleksander" oraz "To wspaniałe życie".

programme.title: Łapu-capu extra
programme.desc: Najśmieszniejsze fragmenty z programów polskich stacji TV: gafy popełniane przez prezenterów, ich nietypowe zachowania przed kamerą oraz awarie techniczne powodujące absurdalne sytuacje.

Les vétos
programme.desc: Les vétos: Directed by Julie Manoukian. With Clovis Cornillac, Noémie Schmidt, Carole Franck, Matthieu Sampeur. In the heart of Morvan, Nico, the last vet in the area, struggles to save his patients, his clinic, and his family. When Michel, his partner and mentor, announces his retirement, Nico knows that the hard part is yet to come. "Don't worry, I've found the next generation'' Except that ... The next generation is Alexandra, a 24-hour graduate, brilliant, misanthropic, and not at all willing to return to bury herself in the village of her childhood. programme.title: Fatman
Sposób na świętego
Fatman
programme.desc:
Fatman: Directed by Eshom Nelms, Ian Nelms. With Mel Gibson, Walton Goggins, Marianne Jean-Baptiste, Chance Hurstfield. A rowdy, unorthodox Santa Claus is fighting to save his declining business. Meanwhile, Billy, a neglected and precocious 12 year old, hires a hit man to kill Santa after receiving a lump of coal in his stocking." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10310140/","name":"Fatman","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjk1NDc4OTEtY2M3OS00M2E3LTk4YTgtYjczMzI1OWQ1ODVlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA0OTM3NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A rowdy, unorthodox Santa Claus is fighting to save his declining business. Meanwhile, Billy, a neglected and precocious 12 year old, hires a hit man to kill Santa after receiving a lump of coal in his stocking.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10310140/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Hey_Sweden"},"dateCreated":"2021-12-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"A welcome alternative to blander holiday movies.","reviewBody":"Chris Cringle a.k.a. Santa Claus, as played as screen icon Mel Gibson, is not really "fat" as the title would imply, but Mel makes the character a badass. However, Chris has incurred the wrath of a thoroughly repugnant devil-child. Billy Wenan (Chance Hurstfield) is a rich 12 year old child whose nasty actions have motivated Chris to gift the kid with a lump of coal. But the kid retaliates by calling upon his favorite hitman (the great character actor Walton Goggins), and hiring him to assassinate Chris!

"Fatman" was, for this viewer, an ingeniously twisted little tale that works hard to be edgy, and delivers some good dark comedy. Of course, it's far from being for all tastes, especially as we see that Billy is ready and willing to torture a schoolmate when she wins a science fair first prize that he feels should have been his. Fairly grim (but not overwhelmingly so), and very violent, the film also delivers some unexpected poignancy as Chris bemoans the state of the world today - and the bad attitudes of its children. Chris himself has fallen on such hard times that he enters into a temporary partnership with the U. S. military, where the elves will be making product other than toys.

Mel is in fine form, and he and the wonderful Marianne Jean-Baptiste make for a rather endearing Mr. And Mrs. Claus. Goggins is superb as the icy-cold, super-efficient hired killer who has his own reasons for wanting to bump off St. Nick. (One amusing character trait is that "Skinny Man"s' pet of choice is a hamster.) Young Hurstfield is very, very good at creating a child character so despicable that you hate him from the word go.

In general, whatever problems the movie has are made up for by the entertaining story that provides an off-the-beaten path experience for those viewers who may be tired of "feel good" fare.

Eight out of 10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21757,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Comedy","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2020-11-17","keywords":"christmas,santa claus character,post office,assassin,elf","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi830914841","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDA1NTNhMWMtYjEzYy00MjFkLThkM2ItYjAwZWMzMDgwOWMxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDA1NTNhMWMtYjEzYy00MjFkLThkM2ItYjAwZWMzMDgwOWMxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"To save his declining business, Chris Cringle (Mel Gibson), also known as Santa Claus, is forced into a partnership with the U.S. military. Making matters worse, Chris gets locked into a deadly battle of wits against a highly skilled assassin (Walton Goggins), hired by a precocious 12-year-old after receiving a lump of coal in his stocking. 'Tis the season for Fatman to get even, in the action-comedy that keeps on giving."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000154/","name":"Mel Gibson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0324658/","name":"Walton Goggins"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001399/","name":"Marianne Jean-Baptiste"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1532523/","name":"Eshom Nelms"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1534497/","name":"Ian Nelms"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0818536/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0465798/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0481625/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1534497/","name":"Ian Nelms"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1532523/","name":"Eshom Nelms"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Łapu-capu extra
programme.desc: Najśmieszniejsze fragmenty z programów polskich stacji TV: gafy popełniane przez prezenterów, ich nietypowe zachowania przed kamerą oraz awarie techniczne powodujące absurdalne sytuacje.

programme.title: Hollywood Buzz
programme.desc: W programie nowości kinowe, relacje z planów zdjęciowych oraz ciekawostki związanych z gwiazdami srebrnego ekranu. O pracy nad najnowszymi hollywoodzkimi produkcjami opowiadają ich twórcy - znani reżyserzy i aktorzy. Autorzy magazynu przedstawiają również zwiastuny filmów wchodzących na ekrany kin.

programme.title: Danny Collins
Idol
Danny Collins
programme.desc: Danny Collins: Directed by Dan Fogelman. With Al Pacino, Annette Bening, Jennifer Garner, Bobby Cannavale. An aging rock star decides to change his life when he discovers a 40-year-old letter written to him by John Lennon." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1772288/","name":"Danny Collins","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDk5NTYxOTk2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzIxMjE0MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An aging rock star decides to change his life when he discovers a 40-year-old letter written to him by John Lennon.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1772288/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"billcurry-1"},"dateCreated":"2015-04-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Intellectually and Emotionally Stimulating Film","reviewBody":"Because this film is intellectually and emotionally stimulating in a subtle way, I had to drive 65 miles, from Lafayette to Baton Rouge, where it was in was in one compartment of a multiplex. That the compartment was Number Nine was a nice touch. But New Orleans had it in three theaters. My review: I enjoyed it. Been a fan of Pacino since Dog Day Afternoon, Plummer since Sound of Music, Lennon since fall, 1963. And I've never seen a movie with Annette Bening that I didn't' like. The script was good; I didn't see anything not to like. So why didn't the movie come to me rather than vice versa? Apparently, the theater owners where I live won't bet on a movie without car chases, guns, shooting, war, all sorts of violence, or juvenile, senseless humor, or mainstream sports. Perhaps a little thriller/horror/sci-fi/blockbuster (Titanic, JFK) might seep through. The sad thing is they may be right. A movie devoid of the aforementioned criteria might lose money here."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":31064,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2015-04-10","keywords":"boyfriend girlfriend relationship,f word,doctor,blog,reference to mike nichols and elaine may","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi343846681","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3Njk4ODU0Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODUzMTc0MzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3Njk4ODU0Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODUzMTc0MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Aging 1970s rocker Danny Collins can't give up his hard-living ways, but when his manager uncovers a 40-year-old undelivered letter written to him by John Lennon, he decides to change course and embarks on a heartfelt journey to rediscover his family, find true love, and begin a second act.\r\n"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000199/","name":"Al Pacino"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000906/","name":"Annette Bening"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004950/","name":"Jennifer Garner"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1557594/","name":"Dan Fogelman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0203259/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0485757/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1557594/","name":"Dan Fogelman"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Radioactive
Skłodowska
Radioactive
programme.desc:
Radioactive: Directed by Marjane Satrapi. With Rosamund Pike, Yvette Feuer, Mirjam Novak, Ralph Berkin. The incredible true story of Marie Sklodowska-Curie and her Nobel Prize-winning work that changed the world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6017756/","name":"Radioactive","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGZkNzY3MmUtYjJlNC00NTM0LWFiNmYtZDA4NzBiMmU1MzI4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODE0OTU5Nzg@._V1_.jpg","description":"The incredible true story of Marie Sklodowska-Curie and her Nobel Prize-winning work that changed the world.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6017756/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"stanimiradeleva"},"dateCreated":"2020-06-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"The wikipedia page about Dr. Curie is way more exciting","reviewBody":"This movie is a pale and shallow effort to represent an extraordinary person with a remarkable life. Marie Curie is an absolute icon one of the most important scientists that ever existed and for sure the most important female scientist. Madamme Curie had a life full of challenges and she fought bravely to overcome barriers in the name of science. Her passion, her brilliance and her character changed the world in more than one way. She opened the way for women in science. She was the first female professor in the University of Paris. She was a poor immigrant, who had to work her way to the top. She was open about love, she was brave and humble and honest. She donated most of her Nobel money. Did we get that in the movie? Maybe 1% of it. The vision of the director about one of the greatest minds of all time is "Sheldon Cooper in a dress". There was some effort to suggest how her discoveries changed the world, but it did not succeed to present the scope and the greatest importance of her work.

This is not a bad movie, actually it is perfectly watchable. Actors are great and the love story between Marie and Pier is adorable. But given the fact that they had such an amazing life, I think the movie is a missed chance.

Still better love story than Twilight though","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":16149,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2020-06-15","keywords":"scientist,physicist,science,physics,chemistry","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1577631257","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWUxMzMxYWQtZjM5Mi00ZGYzLTgyNzUtZWFjNDQ5NTliYjBmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWUxMzMxYWQtZjM5Mi00ZGYzLTgyNzUtZWFjNDQ5NTliYjBmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","description":"A story of the scientific and romantic passions of Marie Sklodowska-Curie (Polish scientist) and Pierre Curie, and the reverberation of their discoveries throughout the 20th century."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0683253/","name":"Rosamund Pike"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0275431/","name":"Yvette Feuer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1597296/","name":"Mirjam Novak"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2277869/","name":"Marjane Satrapi"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0057311/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0319272/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2113666/","name":"Jack Thorne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9706688/","name":"Lauren Redniss"}],"duration":"PT1H49M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 6017756, Title: Radioactive, --- Description: Radioactive: Directed by Marjane Satrapi. With Rosamund Pike, Yvette Feuer, Mirjam Novak, Ralph Berkin. The incredible true story of Marie Sklodowska-Curie and her Nobel Prize-winning work that changed the world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6017756/","name":"Radioactive","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGZkNzY3MmUtYjJlNC00NTM0LWFiNmYtZDA4NzBiMmU1MzI4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODE0OTU5Nzg@._V1_.jpg","description":"The incredible true story of Marie Sklodowska-Curie and her Nobel Prize-winning work that changed the world.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6017756/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"stanimiradeleva","dateCreated":"2020-06-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"The wikipedia page about Dr. Curie is way more exciting","reviewBody":"This movie is a pale and shallow effort to represent an extraordinary person with a remarkable life. Marie Curie is an absolute icon one of the most important scientists that ever existed and for sure the most important female scientist. Madamme Curie had a life full of challenges and she fought bravely to overcome barriers in the name of science. Her passion, her brilliance and her character changed the world in more than one way. She opened the way for women in science. She was the first female professor in the University of Paris. She was a poor immigrant, who had to work her way to the top. She was open about love, she was brave and humble and honest. She donated most of her Nobel money. Did we get that in the movie? Maybe 1% of it. The vision of the director about one of the greatest minds of all time is "Sheldon Cooper in a dress". There was some effort to suggest how her discoveries changed the world, but it did not succeed to present the scope and the greatest importance of her work.

This is not a bad movie, actually it is perfectly watchable. Actors are great and the love story between Marie and Pier is adorable. But given the fact that they had such an amazing life, I think the movie is a missed chance.

Still better love story than Twilight though","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":16149,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2020-06-15","keywords":"scientist,physicist,science,physics,chemistry","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1577631257","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWUxMzMxYWQtZjM5Mi00ZGYzLTgyNzUtZWFjNDQ5NTliYjBmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWUxMzMxYWQtZjM5Mi00ZGYzLTgyNzUtZWFjNDQ5NTliYjBmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","description":"A story of the scientific and romantic passions of Marie Sklodowska-Curie (Polish scientist) and Pierre Curie, and the reverberation of their discoveries throughout the 20th century.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0683253/","name":"Rosamund Pike","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0275431/","name":"Yvette Feuer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1597296/","name":"Mirjam Novak"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2277869/","name":"Marjane Satrapi"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0057311/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0319272/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2113666/","name":"Jack Thorne","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9706688/","name":"Lauren Redniss"],"duration":"PT1H49M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: My Salinger Year
Mój rok z Salingerem
My Salinger Year
programme.desc:
My Salinger Year: Directed by Philippe Falardeau. With Margaret Qualley, Sigourney Weaver, Douglas Booth, Seána Kerslake. A college grad takes a clerical job working for the literary agent of the renowned, reclusive writer J.D. Salinger." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2222052/","name":"My Salinger Year","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjEzNDM4YWMtZWE5Ny00MTliLWEzY2ItODU0NmE2ZTUzMDhlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE1MzI2NzIz._V1_.jpg","description":"A college grad takes a clerical job working for the literary agent of the renowned, reclusive writer J.D. Salinger.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2222052/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"imseeg"},"dateCreated":"2021-08-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Playful, charming, beautiful, original and witty. Unknown GEM!","reviewBody":"BRAVO, what a charming, playful, subtle, witty and original movie this is. A delight to watch!

The story: a young woman leaves everything behind to become a writer in the big city New York. Will she succeed or will she become another failed writer?

The good: this movie is a delight, because of it's playful, charming, subtle and witty nature. You dont have to be into books at all to love this movie.

What's most precious for me about this movie is the photography, especially the many GORGEOUS still screen shots of MARGARET QUALLEY. Those eyes of her, those wide open puppy eyes, ooze innocence and emotions so pure and gentle that they are to die for! Never seen this actress before, but I am instantly smitten with her acting performance, so delicate, so true to life, so expressive.

Any bad? This is a slowburning, subtle story, probably best suited for an arthouse movie audience who are into subtle portraits of characters. A feast to watch! Amazing to see it has only gotten 32 reviews, but it must be the corona troubles with distributing movies that this has slipped from the radar, because it is definitely worth watching every single minute. What a gem!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3724,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-03-05","keywords":"writer","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer (2021)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi728351001","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGM5NjRkMzMtY2QyMi00Y2NmLWEyOTQtY2IwNWRmOTVmNTE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGM5NjRkMzMtY2QyMi00Y2NmLWEyOTQtY2IwNWRmOTVmNTE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"New York in the 90s: After leaving graduate school to pursue her dream of becoming a writer, Joanna (Margaret Qualley) gets hired as an assistant to Margaret (Sigourney Weaver), the stoic and old-fashioned literary agent of J. D. Salinger. Fluctuating between poverty and glamour, she spends her days in a plush, wood-paneled office – where dictaphones and typewriters still reign and agents doze off after three-martini lunches – and her nights in a sink-less Brooklyn apartment with her socialist boyfriend. Joanna’s main task is processing Salinger’s voluminous fan mail, but as she reads the heart-wrenching letters from around the world, she becomes reluctant to send the agency’s impersonal standard letter and impulsively begins personalizing the responses. The results are both humorous and moving, as Joanna, while using the great writer’s voice, begins to discover her own."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4960279/","name":"Margaret Qualley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000244/","name":"Sigourney Weaver"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3150488/","name":"Douglas Booth"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0265852/","name":"Philippe Falardeau"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0089507/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0044330/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0265852/","name":"Philippe Falardeau"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5117507/","name":"Joanna Smith Rakoff"}],"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Foster Boy
Wyrok bez winy
Foster Boy
programme.desc: Foster Boy: Directed by Youssef Delara. With Matthew Modine, Shane Paul McGhie, Lex Scott Davis, Julie Benz. Michael is a high-powered lawyer and Jamal is an angry young man who has been imprisoned after years of abuse in the foster care system. Together they have to overcome their differences to find justice and expose the foster care system." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4669974/","name":"Foster Boy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzFkNGE4N2UtYmE2MC00N2JjLWE4NDgtYTk2OThiNWQ0NTU2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODA4MzkyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Michael is a high-powered lawyer and Jamal is an angry young man who has been imprisoned after years of abuse in the foster care system. Together they have to overcome their differences to find justice and expose the foster care syst","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4669974/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ops-52535"},"dateCreated":"2020-10-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"so slow and sparse","reviewBody":"Its a long time since my last courtroomdrama, and this flick did not motivate for further binging on this genre. the story is important enough, but an inconsistently storyline and plot, where the judge is like a piece of garbage, and the sabotaging done by the case counterpart, are completely ruled out of explanation. i guess the makers have slept through the court tv-series that rumaged in the 1990's and 2000', and where the real action should be aim't\n\nits a piece of terrible caracter building, and the actors doesnt contribute at all. very uninspiring and flat, its a no recommend from the grumpy old man","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":473,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"genre":["Drama","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-09-25","keywords":"foster child,child abuse,civil rights,social justice,foster care","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3650273561","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTRhNWVhM2QtODdiMC00OGZiLTljY2YtZGJkNjBlM2NjMjdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTRhNWVhM2QtODdiMC00OGZiLTljY2YtZGJkNjBlM2NjMjdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Michael Trainer (Matthew Modine) is a high-powered corporate lawyer, estranged from his family and his humanity; Jamal Randolph (Shane Paul McGhie) is an angry young man who has been imprisoned after enduring years of abuse in the corrupt foster care system. If Michael and Jamal can overcome their differences, they may find justice for Jamal and expose the immorality of for-profit foster care."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000546/","name":"Matthew Modine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6341784/","name":"Shane Paul McGhie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6280112/","name":"Lex Scott Davis"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0216459/","name":"Youssef Delara"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0666392/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0090747/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0668974/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3237020/","name":"Jay Paul Deratany"}],"duration":"PT1H49M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian
Noc w muzeum 2
Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian
programme.desc:
Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian: Directed by Shawn Levy. With Ben Stiller, Amy Adams, Owen Wilson, Hank Azaria. Security guard Larry Daley infiltrates the Smithsonian Institution in order to rescue Jedediah and Octavius, who have been shipped to the museum by mistake." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1078912/","name":"Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGZjZDE2NjUtMzVkNy00N2UyLTg5MjYtYzY1ZmM1YWY3ZTZmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjk1Njg5NTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"Security guard Larry Daley infiltrates the Smithsonian Institution in order to rescue Jedediah and Octavius, who have been shipped to the museum by mistake.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1078912/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ajaymittal"},"dateCreated":"2009-05-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Stiller Going Strong","reviewBody":"In a world where unnecessary sequels are plaguing the movie world and are seemingly released for little other reason than to milk the 'cash cow', Night at the Museum 2 is a refreshing exception (unlike Meet the Parents 2,3,4...). It's arguably better than the first.

Although better on different levels The historic characters are not just new and improved but also come with a greater comic value. In what the film lacks in a relatively mundane storyline, it compensates with a wonderful underlying message/moral. There's also a love story again but what struck me as more potent was the greater bond that exists between the rest of the characters; Larry and Jedediah, Jedediah and Octavius etc. The score/music was noticeably better as well, very listenable. Of course the whole picture was far more 'epic' and I, for one, am a fan of this. On the face of this, its a comedy blended perfectly with action like a cocktail of strawberry and champagne – and very much like Tropic Thunder (although on a different level of course). Hank Azaria was brilliant as Kahmunrah especially in the way he could turn from serious evil to light-hearted joker in the blink of an eye. Speaking of which, him and his trio of evil helpers were fantastic together, as am sure you'll all agree.

The one downside is that too many of the best comedy moments were shown in the trailers, so kind of dampening the effect of many of the genuinely funny moments. But there's still enough to keep you chuckling away! So should there be a third? If they can continue to make people laugh whilst rummaging through their popcorn during the action scenes, I'd day why not? IMDb data; ttnr: 1078912, Title: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian, --- Description: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian: Directed by Shawn Levy. With Ben Stiller, Amy Adams, Owen Wilson, Hank Azaria. Security guard Larry Daley infiltrates the Smithsonian Institution in order to rescue Jedediah and Octavius, who have been shipped to the museum by mistake." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1078912/","name":"Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGZjZDE2NjUtMzVkNy00N2UyLTg5MjYtYzY1ZmM1YWY3ZTZmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjk1Njg5NTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"Security guard Larry Daley infiltrates the Smithsonian Institution in order to rescue Jedediah and Octavius, who have been shipped to the museum by mistake.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1078912/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ajaymittal","dateCreated":"2009-05-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Stiller Going Strong","reviewBody":"In a world where unnecessary sequels are plaguing the movie world and are seemingly released for little other reason than to milk the 'cash cow', Night at the Museum 2 is a refreshing exception (unlike Meet the Parents 2,3,4...). It's arguably better than the first.

Although better on different levels The historic characters are not just new and improved but also come with a greater comic value. In what the film lacks in a relatively mundane storyline, it compensates with a wonderful underlying message/moral. There's also a love story again but what struck me as more potent was the greater bond that exists between the rest of the characters; Larry and Jedediah, Jedediah and Octavius etc. The score/music was noticeably better as well, very listenable. Of course the whole picture was far more 'epic' and I, for one, am a fan of this. On the face of this, its a comedy blended perfectly with action like a cocktail of strawberry and champagne – and very much like Tropic Thunder (although on a different level of course). Hank Azaria was brilliant as Kahmunrah especially in the way he could turn from serious evil to light-hearted joker in the blink of an eye. Speaking of which, him and his trio of evil helpers were fantastic together, as am sure you'll all agree.

The one downside is that too many of the best comedy moments were shown in the trailers, so kind of dampening the effect of many of the genuinely funny moments. But there's still enough to keep you chuckling away! So should there be a third? If they can continue to make people laugh whilst rummaging through their popcorn during the action scenes, I'd day why not? After all, what is life without a bit of fun?","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":187813,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6,"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Family"],"datePublished":"2009-05-20","keywords":"al capone character,darth vader character,theodore roosevelt character,abraham lincoln character,albert einstein character","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian -- Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1663697689","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODE1MDI2NTk1NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTAyNjkxMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODE1MDI2NTk1NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTAyNjkxMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Security guard Larry Daley infiltrates the Smithsonian Institute in order to rescue Jedediah and Octavius, who have been shipped to the museum by mistake.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001774/","name":"Ben Stiller","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005562/","name":"Owen Wilson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0010736/","name":"Amy Adams"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506613/","name":"Shawn Levy"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0158853/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046151/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0304830/","name":"Robert Ben Garant","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0502073/","name":"Thomas Lennon"],"duration":"PT1H45M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ashes in the Snow
Szare śniegi Syberii
Ashes in the Snow
programme.desc:
Ashes in the Snow: Directed by Marius A. Markevicius. With Bel Powley, Lisa Loven Kongsli, Martin Wallström, Jonah Hauer-King. In 1941, a 16-year-old aspiring artist and her family are deported to Siberia amidst Stalin's brutal dismantling of the Baltic region. One girl's passion for art and her never-ending hope will break the silence of history." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3759298/","name":"Ashes in the Snow","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGFjYmJlZmMtZDQxZC00MDZjLTkzNzMtNTIwNzU5NGY5NzIyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjkzODg0Mzc@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 1941, a 16-year-old aspiring artist and her family are deported to Siberia amidst Stalin's brutal dismantling of the Baltic region. One girl's passion for art and her never-ending hope will break the silence of history.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3759298/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"idonotexist"},"dateCreated":"2019-01-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"So close, yet so far","reviewBody":"Total pun considering the distance to siberia. This movie aims for there, but gets bogged in a swamp outside moscow.

I wish i could file criminal charges against the production team because the way they managed to destroy such a captivating character should be criminal. Kretzsky, of course is who i am getting at. The potential setup of him was brilliant but it fizzled out into nothing. Then, about 3/4 of the movie in, his character gets a chance of redemption. And what does the movie do? Just absolutely nothing. If you do not get angered by how they threw away all their characters away you did not watch this movie.

The scenery was nice, the sets well made, the real life element capture was close to that of schindler's list. And that's all this movie has for it! All the raw emotion, personal struggle, complex relationships all the things they could have focused on in a movie about siberia (where NOTHING happens) they didnt. Instead it is just one scene of build up after another, then fizzle, then more of the same. No follow through, no culmination, no emotion.

At the end i couldn't care if any of them survived. The complete failure of this crew to attach the viewer to what should have been a sad tale of struggle cannot be forgiven.

And to further insult us, of course the propaganda message before titles roll just had to be there, because let's face it. Unless you literally typed it on the screen, nobody would have grasped what this was even about. It was that bad.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6060,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"genre":["Drama","History","Romance"],"datePublished":"2018-10-12","keywords":"communism,deportation,soviet union,political repression,rape attempt","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Ashes in the Snow","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi372423193","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGMzMjQ4YzMtNzI1OC00NzdhLTk1MWMtOWVlMDYwZDNiMjExXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGMzMjQ4YzMtNzI1OC00NzdhLTk1MWMtOWVlMDYwZDNiMjExXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2525790/","name":"Bel Powley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2966840/","name":"Lisa Loven Kongsli"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0909412/","name":"Martin Wallström"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2101256/","name":"Marius A. programme.title: As Gouda as it Gets
Gouda i miłość
As Gouda as It Gets
programme.desc: As Gouda as it Gets: Directed by Anne De Léan. With Kim Shaw, Clayton James, Tara Joshi, Romaine Waite. Artisan cheese shop owner Brie finds herself competing for a $50,000 prize in her town's annual Cheese Festival. To boost her presence, she teams up with an influential cheese critic to profile her vintage smoked gouda. As their friendship develops into romance, a competitor's business proposal and unforeseen complications force Brie to put her shop - and heart - on the line." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt13176206/","name":"As Gouda as it Gets","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDQ2YjVkOGMtNzE3NC00MmU0LTk3ZWEtOGE5OGU4NjljOGM4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTk1NzUwMA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Artisan cheese shop owner Brie finds herself competing for a $50,000 prize in her town's annual Cheese Festival. programme.title: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian
Nocna randka
Date Night
programme.desc:
Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian: Directed by Shawn Levy. With Ben Stiller, Amy Adams, Owen Wilson, Hank Azaria. Security guard Larry Daley infiltrates the Smithsonian Institution in order to rescue Jedediah and Octavius, who have been shipped to the museum by mistake." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1078912/","name":"Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGZjZDE2NjUtMzVkNy00N2UyLTg5MjYtYzY1ZmM1YWY3ZTZmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjk1Njg5NTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"Security guard Larry Daley infiltrates the Smithsonian Institution in order to rescue Jedediah and Octavius, who have been shipped to the museum by mistake.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1078912/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ajaymittal"},"dateCreated":"2009-05-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Stiller Going Strong","reviewBody":"In a world where unnecessary sequels are plaguing the movie world and are seemingly released for little other reason than to milk the 'cash cow', Night at the Museum 2 is a refreshing exception (unlike Meet the Parents 2,3,4...). It's arguably better than the first.

Although better on different levels The historic characters are not just new and improved but also come with a greater comic value. In what the film lacks in a relatively mundane storyline, it compensates with a wonderful underlying message/moral. There's also a love story again but what struck me as more potent was the greater bond that exists between the rest of the characters; Larry and Jedediah, Jedediah and Octavius etc. The score/music was noticeably better as well, very listenable. Of course the whole picture was far more 'epic' and I, for one, am a fan of this. On the face of this, its a comedy blended perfectly with action like a cocktail of strawberry and champagne – and very much like Tropic Thunder (although on a different level of course). Hank Azaria was brilliant as Kahmunrah especially in the way he could turn from serious evil to light-hearted joker in the blink of an eye. Speaking of which, him and his trio of evil helpers were fantastic together, as am sure you'll all agree.

The one downside is that too many of the best comedy moments were shown in the trailers, so kind of dampening the effect of many of the genuinely funny moments. But there's still enough to keep you chuckling away! So should there be a third? If they can continue to make people laugh whilst rummaging through their popcorn during the action scenes, I'd day why not? After all, what is life without a bit of fun?","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":187813,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Family"],"datePublished":"2009-05-20","keywords":"al capone character,darth vader character,theodore roosevelt character,abraham lincoln character,albert einstein character","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian -- Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1663697689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODE1MDI2NTk1NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTAyNjkxMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODE1MDI2NTk1NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTAyNjkxMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Security guard Larry Daley infiltrates the Smithsonian Institute in order to rescue Jedediah and Octavius, who have been shipped to the museum by mistake."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001774/","name":"Ben Stiller"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005562/","name":"Owen Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0010736/","name":"Amy Adams"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506613/","name":"Shawn Levy"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0158853/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046151/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0304830/","name":"Robert Ben Garant"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0502073/","name":"Thomas Lennon"}],"duration":"PT1H45M"}</script><metacontent="
